content: The Earth Spirit Cap is obtained upon defeating Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai in Field of Fire in Chapter 5 - Flaming Mountains.

The Earth Spirit Cap is obtained upon defeating Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai in Field of Fire in Chapter 5 - Flaming Mountains.
